Welcome to UU

Welcome to UU

Whether you are joining us for the first time or returning to your studies, we are committed to delivering the best possible experience for you.

Research & Innovation

The Doctoral College

Our PhD Researchers ranked provision at Ulster to be higher than the UK average across all indicators.

Collaborate with us

We work with hundreds of businesses annually in the delivery of effective innovative and research-based solutions. You can engage the university's researchers to help solve tangible business issues.

Research Topics

In the top 25% of UK Universities for Research Power, we’re committed to delivering globally significant research with local relevance.
